channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Black bags flytipped by wall on pavement, 13th November
item.description:
A number of bag have been flytipped by the wall on the pavement. Split open by foxes and need clearing asap. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Daniels Road, Nunhead, London

item.title: Temporary traffic lights and no work being done, 13th November
item.description:
Temporary traffic lights blocking off a completely clear bit of busy road. They have been there all day yet no work done at all. Are they just there to cause congestion? That is all they are achieving!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 146-148, Park View Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fast flowing water out of gully, 13th November
item.description:
Fast flowing water out of gully flooding Salter's Hill and Central Hill. Source near to 22 Salter's Hill, SE19 1DZ Thames Water refuse to attend as say Local Authority has responsibility for gullies. Multiple gullies down Hill now blocked with grit and debris adding to flooding. Central Hill and Salter's Hill junction now flooded on a steep hill. Extremely slippy and is dangerous for mopeds, motorcycles and cycles. Urgent action is needed and appropriate authority escalated to address , and before freezing wintery connections

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Salters Hill, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hazardous Rubbish dumping, 13th November
item.description:
This area has become a regular dumping spot despite previous reports to the council. There is now a TV on the pavement posing a safety hazard to pedestrians. It was originally on the opposite side of the road, blocking pavement access. Please could someone arrange for it to be removed as soon as possible? It was already reported this morning through the council website, yet no action has been taken The ongoing fly-tipping here has been an issue for over a month, and the street is not being cleaned regularly. It’s disrespectful to residents and unsafe,

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Merrow Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Zebra crossing on Heath Street near NW3 1DN, 13th November
item.description:
An unknown person keeps repeatedly parking their bicycle on the pavement at a zebra crossing. This is a daily occurrence. It has continued for well over two weeks. It is a danger. And it is illegal.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heath Street, Belsize Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: England flags, 13th November
item.description:
England flags around the area are causing offence and have been put up as the result of anti social behaviour. They are, essentially, offensive, racist and aggressive in what they represent. Please remove all of the flags.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Sayes Court Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
